# Pull Request

## Description

Please provide a clear and concise description of your changes.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Test improvement

## Related Issues

Fixes #(issue number)
Related to #(issue number)

## Changes Made

Please list the key changes:

- Change 1
- Change 2
- Change 3

## Validation Results

If applicable, attach validation results showing your changes work:

- [ ] All validators pass
- [ ] No regression in accuracy
- [ ] Performance impact measured (if applicable)

## Testing

- [ ] Added new tests
- [ ] All tests pass locally
- [ ] Updated existing tests
- [ ] Manual testing completed

### Test Coverage

- Current coverage: X%
- Target coverage: Y%

## Documentation

- [ ] Updated README if needed
- [ ] Updated docstrings
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] Added examples if applicable

## Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Ran `make format` (black + isort)
- [ ] Ran `make lint` (flake8 + mypy)
- [ ] No linter warnings
- [ ] Added type hints where applicable

## Performance Impact

If this PR affects performance:

- Before: X seconds
- After: Y seconds
- Speedup: Z%

## Breaking Changes

If this introduces breaking changes, describe:

1. What breaks
2. How to migrate
3. Deprecation timeline

## Screenshots/Visualizations

If applicable, add screenshots or visualizations showing your changes.

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

## Additional Notes

Add any additional notes for reviewers here.

---

## For Reviewers

### Review Checklist

- [ ] Code quality is acceptable
- [ ] Tests are comprehensive
- [ ] Documentation is clear
- [ ] No security concerns
- [ ] Performance is acceptable
- [ ] Breaking changes are justified and documented
